Flicker::

"I think I have the answer to that," Flicker offers.  He takes o=
ut 
the now-completed device he'd been working on earlier.  "We can use 
th=
is sensor-jamming beacon to hide ourselves from enemy scanners.  
Unfortuna=
tely it would also mess up our own commlinks."  He doesn't 
mention the fac=
t that he still has a secure beacon to the Predacon 
base that the jamming =
field wouldn't affect.  (dewboy came up with 
that, not me.)
